caption.p: Total phenolic content (TPC) ( ■) and antioxidant capacity expressed as IC 50 values of the 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH)▪ scavenging activity (●) in oregano essential oil (OEO), clove essential oil (CLEO), S. nigra flower extract (SNE) and butylhydroxytoluene (BHT) (mean ± SD). Different letters mean significant differences (orange letters with asterisks for the TPC and black letters without asterisks for the IC 50 values).
